title: The JSON Schema for specific science domains
description: A JSON Schema which helps add different science initiatives and related projects together

Aggregation.description: Agregation of different resources published with PDR and are part of a science initiative

creators.title: Creators
creators.description: The individuals that created this aggregation and initially defined its memebership

ScienceTheme.description: An aggregation of resources that are considered contributions to a particular science or research theme.
notes: Although this type defines no new properties beyond those inherited from its parent type (Aggregation), it is expected that instances will often make use of vocabularies specific to the science theme.

DynamicResourceSet.description: this provides a search query to get all the resources part of this aggregation

searchURL.description: the URL for querying service to get list of resources
